item.description:
It is time again for Gale to play her lovely piano music at cozy Cugino's in Cheshire, and I would like to invite all my meetup friends, new and old,  and all friends of friends to come together to have a good meal, relax, meet new people, and enjoy a sweet serenade.

For those of you who have not heard Gale B. Gardiner before, her music is quite lovely and soulful. Cugino's is a nice place for dinner, somewhere that you can talk and socialize without shouting, even when the wonderful piano music is being played!

There is no cover charge for this evening, but you will likely want to enjoy a wonderful Northern Italian meal accompanied by owner Baki's warm hospitality.

You can learn more about Gale and her music here: http://www.cdbaby.com/cd/galebgardiner3
item.name: April Showers bring fun Cugino's Hours!
